title: A new coronavirus associated with human respiratory disease in China Supplementary information
body: a Amino acids of replicase proteins pp1a and pp1ab were numbered with the assumption that a -1 ribosomal 51 frameshift occurs to express ORF1b, and use of the slippery sequence UUUAAAC is predicted to yield a peptide 52 bond between Asn4401 and Arg4402 in pp1ab.
